lead_paragraph: DUBE--Alexander J. (1948 - 2016) The dance world lost a dedicated advocate last week. Alexander J. Dube, who led Career Transition For Dancers since 2001 and was instrumental in integrating their programs and services into The Actors Fund last year, passed away at the age of 67. He had a great passion for dancers and worked tirelessly for the dance community. The Actors Fund sends condolences to his family and his many friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUBE, ALEXANDER J
